item.title: [COLOR lime][B] B I E N V E N I D O S[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] A [/COLOR][COLOR deepskyblue]J.H.G. M A S T E R[/B][/COLOR]

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = "Bienvenido a J.H.G. Master" line2 = "Disfruta de su Contenido" line3 = "Totalmente Gratuito" xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1, line2, line3) return

item.title: [COLOR yellow][B] A G R A D E C I M I E N T O S:[/COLOR][/B]
[B][COLOR lightslategray]A ,ION,ANGEL,,DELIA,MONTSE,LA FAMILIA TVBOX[/COLOR][/B] Por su gran esfuerzo

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = ",Ion,Angel,Montse,Delia, " line2 = "GRACIAS " line3 = "Por estar ahi." xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1, line2, line3) return

item.title: [B][COLOR blue]CA[/COLOR][COLOR yellow]TO[/COLOR][COLOR red]AL[/COLOR][/B] Por su Paciencia

regex.name: openDialog
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import xbmcaddon import xbmcgui def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): __addon__ = xbmcaddon.Addon() __addonname__ = __addon__.getAddonInfo('name') line1 = "CATOAL " line2 = "GRACIAS " line3 = "Gran Amigo." xbmcgui.Dialog().ok(__addonname__, line1, line2, line3) return
